item.title: Python Post
item.description: There are actually quite a lot of interesting things that can be done with Python (the language, not an actual pythonâ€¦). You can create lists of animal names. Or groceries. Or whatever you want really, but we can do animals here as an example. animals = ["Orca", "Wolf", "Gecko"] Within the same list we manipulate it however we want without having to go back and rewrite an entirely new list.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
